mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, email, password, age, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{age}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, age = #{age}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, email, password, age, create_time, update_time FROM users ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id, username, email, password, age, create_time, update_time FROM users ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
